name: ThePirateBay Black by a3cAnton
additional_info:
10-02-2015 First release.
11-02-2015 fixed Chrome css-filter issue.
30-06-2015 Included proxies for countries with access forbidden, plus many little fixes.
css:
/* Created 10-02-2015 by Antonio Ferreiro Ferrero AKA "a3cAnton" */
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document regexp("http(s)?://(thepiratebay|pirateproxy|tpbproxy|torrentdr|tpb.freebypass|baytorrent|thepirateboat|theofflinebay|tpb.vnstat|thehiddenbay|www.piratefly).*"){input,select,select > button,checkbox,input[type="checkbox"],tbody,table,td,th{-moz-appearance:none!important;-webkit-appearance:none!important}#main-content iframe,#details iframe,#sky-banner{display:none!important}:focus{outline:none!important}*:not(a):not(input):not(placeholder):not(select):not(option):not(textarea):not(span):not(th),select{color:#999!important;text-shadow:1px 1px #000!important}input[type="search"],input[type="text"],input[type="password"],input[type="email"]{font-weight:bold!important}input,placeholder,select *,input *,input[type="search"] *,* textarea,* textarea *{color:#bbb!important;text-shadow:1px 1px #222!important}input[type="submit"],#detailsframe #title,tr.header > th,tr.header > th div,table#searchResult tr:last-child td[colspan="9"] a{color:hsla(0,0%,50%,.2)!important;text-shadow:0 -1px rgba(0,0,0,.75),0 1px 9px hsla(0,50%,65%,.25),0 1px 1px hsla(0,0%,99%,.1)!important}input[type="submit"]:hover,input[type="search"]:hover,table#searchResult tr:last-child td[colspan="9"] b,table#searchResult tr:hover a{color:#fff!important;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em hsla(0,0%,75%,.8)!important}a{text-decoration:none!important;color:hsl(25,30%,50%)!important;text-shadow:1px 1px hsla(25,90%,20%,.9)!important}a:hover,table#searchResult tr:last-child td[colspan="9"] a:hover,a.detDesc{color:#f44!important}a:hover{text-decoration:none!important;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em #f00!important}a:visited:not(:hover){color:#629!important}abbr[title="Seeders"],abbr[title="Seeders"] a,table#searchResult tr > td:nth-child(3),#details dl.col2 > dd:nth-child(6){color:#090!important}abbr[title="Leechers"],abbr[title="Leechers"] a,table#searchResult tr > td:nth-child(4),#details dl.col2 > dd:nth-child(8){color:#bb0!important}h2 span{font-size:larger!important}table#searchResult tr:last-child td[colspan="9"] *{font-size:18px!important;line-height:18px!important}div.download a{font-size:16px!important}input[type="submit"],table#searchResult tr:last-child td[colspan="9"] *{font-weight:bold!important}html,body{background:hsl(0,0%,0%)!important}table#searchResult tr:not(:hover) td,#detailsframe,#details{background:hsl(0,0%,9%)!important}input,select,* textarea,* textarea *,div[id^="comment-"],#comments .comment{background-color:hsl(0,0%,20%)!important}checkbox,.nfo{background-color:hsla(0,0%,30%,.7)!important}h2,th,tr,td{background-color:transparent!important}input:not([type="submit"]):not([type="checkbox"]),a,a:hover,textarea{border:none!important}h2,#detailsouterframe *{border-color:transparent!important}table#searchResult th,table#searchResult tr,table#searchResult td{border-color:transparent transparent!important}input[type="submit"],select > button,input[type="checkbox"],select{border:1px solid hsla(0,0%,40%,.7)!important}*:not(img):not(input),tbody *,select > optgroup,optgroup,#q a.img,input[type="checkbox"],checkbox{border-radius:3px!important}img{border-radius:2px!important}input:not([type="checkbox"]){border-radius:4px!important}input:not([type="submit"]):not([type="checkbox"]),select,.nfo,div[id^="comment-"],textarea{box-shadow:0 1px 5px 0 #000 inset,0 -1px 1px 0 hsla(0,0%,55%,1) inset!important}table#searchResult tr:not(:hover){box-shadow:0 1px 3px 0 #000 inset,0 -1px 1px 0 hsla(0,0%,33%,.7) inset!important}table#searchResult tr:not(:hover) td{box-shadow:1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3) inset!important}input[type="checkbox"]{box-shadow:1px 1px 2px 0 #000 inset!important}input[type="submit"],select > button,#detailsframe #title,#commentsheader h4,tr.header,table#searchResult tr:last-child td[colspan="9"]{background-image:linear-gradient(180deg,#666 48%,#333 49%,#222 85%,#444)!important}select > button{box-shadow:0 6px 3px hsla(0,0%,66%,.5) inset,0 -9px 6px hsla(0,0%,9%,.9) inset!important}input[type="submit"]:hover,select > button:active,option:checked,select:focus > option:checked,select:focus > optgroup > option:checked,table#searchResult tr:not(.header):hover{background-image:radial-gradient(ellipse farthest-corner at center bottom,hsla(0,99%,55%,.8) 0%,transparent 99%),linear-gradient(180deg,#666 48%,#333 49%,#222 85%,#444)!important}input[type="submit"]:hover,select > button:active{box-shadow:0 1px 3px hsla(0,0%,75%,.6) inset,0 0 6px hsla(0,99%,75%,.8)!important}a:hover,input[type="submit"]:hover,select > button:active,table#searchResult tr:hover{transition:.001s,.1s text-shadow ease!important;-webkit-transition:.001s,.1s text-shadow ease!important}a{transition:.4s!important;-webkit-transition:.4s!important}input[type="submit"],table#searchResult tr{transition:.6s ease-in-out,.75s color ease,.9s text-shadow ease-in-out!important;-webkit-transition:6s ease-in-out,.75s color ease,.9s text-shadow ease-in-out!important}table#searchResult tr:last-child td[colspan="9"]{height:2.5em!important}#loginForm fieldset label{margin-left:-9px!important}#TPBlogo{margin-right:8px!important}.torpicture img{margin: 5px 0 !important}#detailsframe #title{margin-bottom:4px!important}#commentsheader h4,div[id^="comment-"]{margin-bottom:6px!important}select,h2 span,#commentsheader h4{padding:2px 6px!important}div[id^="comment-"]{padding:4px!important}#fp h1 a,#TPBlogo{filter:invert(1) contrast(150%) grayscale(1)!important}a[href^="/search"]:hover>img[border="0"][alt],a[href^="/browse"]:hover>img[border="0"][alt][src^="/static/img/"]{filter:brightness(200%) drop-shadow(0 0 3px #fff)!important}table#searchResult tr:last-child td[colspan="9"] a,table#searchResult tr:last-child td[colspan="9"] a img{transition:.5s!important}}
